trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Franklin
There were no other sightings in Franklin on or around May 13th 2010
Summary: It looked like a cigar and it was black and silver.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband called me and told me to go outside and look at the sky,I was inside my house cooking so I went outside and I saw what looked liked a cigar floating in the sky, my husband states that he saw it around 1 pm today and it is now 3 O'clock and is still up in the sky, it seems to change colors, it's black but it also looks like silver. It looks flexible. I could not believe it, some people calculate that it might be the size of a football field.
